PILOT.name: P. Zissou
PILOT.description: The fearless leader of your expedition.

JAC.name: Jac-Suit
JAC.description: A simple diving suit. Looks suspciously like a submarine.

HD1.name: Foot Drive
HD1.description: A solid state drive that fits in a boot.

HD2.name: Other Foot Drive
HD2.description: Another solid state drive for your other boot.

LITE1.name: Light 1
LITE1.description: A simple light will help in your searching.

BAT1.name: Battery I
BAT1.description: A simple battery pack that provides extra energy capacity.

BOOST.name: Booster I
BOOST.description: This device will help you dive and climb with more speed.

DD1.name: Deep Drive I
DD1.description: An advanced solid state drive for holding sensitive scientific results.

BAT2.name: Battery II
BAT2.description: A simple battery pack that provides extra energy capacity.

HELM1.name: Dive Helmet
HELM1.description: A pressurized helmet that will allow you to dive deeper.

SONR1.name: Sonar I
SONR1.description: Simple sonar device that can help collect valuable data.

TICH.name: Tidal Charger
TICH.description: Use the waves to generate a small amount of electricity.

SUB1.name: Submarine
SUB1.description: Submarine allows you to dive even deeper.

STARS.name: Starship
STARS.description: With enough credits you can purchase the right to fly the startship to another planet.
